LanguageData.BuildHandGun.label: Build Colt M1911
LanguageData.BuildHandGun.description: Builds an ancient pattern automatic pistol. Weak and short range, but quick.\nCaliber: .45 ACP
LanguageData.BuildP226Gun.label: Build SIG Sauer P226
LanguageData.BuildP226Gun.description: The SIG Sauer P226 is a full-sized, service-type pistol made by SIG Sauer. Low damage, high rate of fire and good accuracy.\nCaliber: .40 Rimfire
LanguageData.BuildDeringerPistol.label: Build Remington M95 Derringer
LanguageData.BuildDeringerPistol.description: Builds a Remington M95 Derringer, a small decorated revolver. Accurate at short range only. Moderately damaging with a short aim and cooldown period.\nCaliber: .45 ACP
LanguageData.BuildSphinxPistol.label: Build Sphinx AT 2000
LanguageData.BuildSphinxPistol.description: Builds a Sphinx AT 2000, a high quality and highly durable handgun that is used by elite forces and sport shooters. Great accuracy, moderate damage but a tad slow.\nCaliber: 9x19mm Para
LanguageData.BuildVektorCP.label: Build Vektor CP1
LanguageData.BuildVektorCP.description: Builds a Vektor CP1, an ergonomical handgun with a drastically non-rectangular design. Good accuracy and low recoil, but weak with a slightly lower range.\nCaliber: 9x19mm Para
LanguageData.BuildParaOrdnancePFourteenFortyfive.desc: Builds a Para Ordnance P14-45m. High accuracy and above average range, average fire rate and damage.\nCaliber: .45 ACP
LanguageData.BuildTecnine.label: Build TEC-9
LanguageData.BuildTecnine.description: Builds a Tec-9 lightweight semi-automatic pistol with a quick draw, low damage and very high firerate. Operates at a short range.\nCaliber: 9x19mm Para
LanguageData.Build93RBurstPistol.label: Build Beretta 93R
LanguageData.Build93RBurstPistol.description: Builds a Beretta 93R, a nice-looking machinepistol with a very fast burstfire mode. Low stopping power and hits up to pistol range.\nCaliber: 9x19mm Para
LanguageData.BuildMagnum.label: Build .44 Remington Magnum
LanguageData.BuildMagnum.description: Builds the .44 Remington Magnum. Very lightweight and accurate at medium range.\nCaliber: .44 Magnum
LanguageData.BuildDesertEagle.label: Build Desert Eagle .50AE
LanguageData.BuildDesertEagle.description: Builds the Desert Eagle .50AE, a famous and deadly pistol. Very accurate, fast fire rate and lightweight to carry.\nCaliber: .50 AE
